<P STYLE='MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>(A)</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>The term &#147;earnings&#148; shall be defined as
pretax income from continuing operations. Add to pretax income the amount of
fixed charges adjusted to exclude (a) the amount of any interest capitalized
during the period (b) the actual amount of any preferred securities dividend
requirements of majority owned subsidiaries (c) preferred stock dividends which
were included in such fixed charges amount but not deducted in the
determination of pre-tax income.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>(B)</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>Fixed Charges represent (a) interest, whether
expensed or capitalized, (b) amortization of debt discount and premium expense
(c) an estimate of interest implicit in rentals &#160;and (d) preferred securities dividend requirements of majority
owned subsidiaries and preferred stock dividends, increased to reflect the
pre-tax earnings requirement for PSE&amp;G.</FONT></P>

</BODY>

</HTML>

</TEXT>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>(A)</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>The term &#147;earnings&#148; shall be defined as
pretax income from continuing operations. Add to pretax income the amount of
fixed charges adjusted to exclude the amount of any interest capitalized during
the period.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>(B)</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>Fixed Charges represent (a) interest, whether
expensed or capitalized, (b) amortization of debt discount, premium and expense
and (c) an estimate of interest implicit in rentals.</FONT></P>


</BODY>

</HTML>

</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>(A)</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>The term &#147;earnings&#148; shall be defined as
pretax income from continuing operations before income or loss from equity
investees plus distributed income from equity investees. Add to pretax income
the amount of fixed charges adjusted to exclude the amount of any interest
capitalized during the period. </FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>(B)</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>Fixed Charges represent (a) interest, whether
expensed or capitalized, (b) amortization of debt discount, premium and expense
(c) an estimate of interest implicit in rentals.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>(C)</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>The
  ratio of earnings to fixed charges for the year ended December 31, 2002 and
  the nine months ended September 30, 2002, were (0.54) and (1.41), respectively,
  as noted above, which represents a deficiency of $358 million and $432 million,
  respectively.</FONT></P>

<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 31

<TITLE></TITLE>

<BODY>


<P ALIGN=RIGHT STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:12.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT'><FONT SIZE=2><B>EXHIBIT 31</B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:12.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER'><FONT SIZE=2><B>Certification Pursuant to Rules </B><B>13a-14 and 15d-14<BR>
of the 1934 Securities Exchange Act</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE=' MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>I, E. James Ferland, certify
that: </FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>I
have reviewed this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of Public Service Enterprise
Group Incorporated; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a
material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information
included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and
for, the periods presented in this report; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>The
registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing
and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:77.7PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(a) Designed such disclosure
controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to
be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating
to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us
by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this
report is being prepared; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:77.7PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Evaluated the
effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such evaluation; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:77.7PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(c) Disclosed in this report
any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that
occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s
fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially
affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s
internal control over financial reporting; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>The
registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our
most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s board of
directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions): </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:77.7PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(a) All significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:8.0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Any fraud, whether or
not material, that involves management or other employees who have a
significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT></P>

<P ALIGN=RIGHT STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:12.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT'><FONT SIZE=2><B>EXHIBIT 31.1</B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:12.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER'><FONT SIZE=2><B>Certification Pursuant to Rules </B><B>13a-14 and 15d-14<BR>
of the 1934 Securities Exchange Act</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE=' MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>I, Thomas M. O&#146;Flynn,
certify that: </FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>I
have reviewed this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of Public Service Enterprise
Group Incorporated; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue
statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make
the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements
were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial
information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects
the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant
as of, and for, the periods presented in this report; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for
establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:77.7PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(a) Designed such disclosure
controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to
be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating
to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us
by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this
report is being prepared; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:77.7PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Evaluated the
effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such evaluation; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:77.7PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(c) Disclosed in this report
any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that
occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s
fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially
affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal
control over financial reporting; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed,
based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial
reporting, to the registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s
board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions): </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:77.7PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(a) All significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:8.0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Any fraud, whether or
not material, that involves management or other employees who have a
significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.

<BODY>

<P ALIGN=RIGHT STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT'><FONT SIZE=2><B>EXHIBIT 31.4</B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER'><FONT SIZE=2><B>Certification Pursuant to Rules 13a-14 and 15d-14<BR>of the 1934 Securities Exchange Act</B></FONT></P>


<P STYLE='MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-TOP:8PT;'><FONT SIZE=2>I, E. James Ferland, certify
that: </FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >I
have reviewed this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of PSEG Power LLC; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a
material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information
included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and
for, the periods presented in this report; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >The
registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing
and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(a) Designed such disclosure
controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to
be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating
to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us
by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this
report is being prepared; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Evaluated the
effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such evaluation; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(c) Disclosed in this report
any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that
occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s
fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially
affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s
internal control over financial reporting; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >The
registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our
most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s board of
directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions): </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(a) All significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:8.0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Any fraud, whether or
not material, that involves management or other employees who have a
significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</FONT></P>

have reviewed this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of PSEG Power LLC; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >Based

made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >Based

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >The
registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(a) Designed such disclosure

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Evaluated the
effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(c) Disclosed in this report
any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that
occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s
fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially
affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s

deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and </FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:8.0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Any fraud, whether or
not material, that involves management or other employees who have a

L.L.C.; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >Based

made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information
included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and
for, the periods presented in this report; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >The
registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing
and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(a) Designed such disclosure
controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to
be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating
to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us
by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Evaluated the
effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such evaluation; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(c) Disclosed in this report
any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that
occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s
fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially
affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s
internal control over financial reporting; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:-11PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0IN;MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2 >The
registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our
most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s board of
directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions): </FONT></P>
<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0IN; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(a) All significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and </FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:8.0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:77.75PT'><FONT SIZE=2>(b) Any fraud, whether or
not material, that involves management or other employees who have a
significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</FONT></P>

<BR>
<TABLE BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 STYLE='BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;' WIDTH="100%">
 <TR>
  <TD WIDTH="47%" VALIGN=BOTTOM>  <P STYLE='MARGIN-LEFT:51.85PT'><FONT SIZE=2>Date:&#160;&#160; <u>October 30, 2003</u></FONT></P>  </TD>
  <TD COLSPAN="2" VALIGN=BOTTOM>  <P><FONT SIZE=2>/s/ Thomas
  M. O&#146;Flynn</FONT></P>  </TD>
 </TR>
 <TR>
  <TD WIDTH="47%" VALIGN=BOTTOM>  <P><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></P>  </TD>
  <TD WIDTH="22%" VALIGN=BOTTOM>  <HR SIZE=1 WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE COLOR=GRAY ALIGN=CENTER>


  </TD>
  <TD WIDTH="31%" VALIGN=BOTTOM>  <P><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></P>  </TD>
 </TR>
 <TR>
  <TD WIDTH="47%" VALIGN=BOTTOM>  <P><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></P>  </TD>
  <TD COLSPAN="2" VALIGN=BOTTOM>  <P><FONT SIZE=2><B>Thomas M. O&#146;Flynn </B></FONT></P>  </TD>
 </TR>
 <TR>
  <TD WIDTH="47%" VALIGN=BOTTOM>  <P><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></P>  </TD>
  <TD COLSPAN="2" VALIGN=BOTTOM>  <P><FONT SIZE=2>PSEG Energy
  Holdings L.L.C.</FONT></P>  </TD>

</HEAD>

<P ALIGN=RIGHT STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT'><FONT SIZE=2><B>EXHIBIT
32.6</B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN=CENTER STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER'><FONT SIZE=2><B>Certification Pursuant to Section 1350 of
Chapter 63 of Title 18<BR>
of the United States Code</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE='MARGIN-TOP:8.0PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:0IN;MARGIN-BOTTOM:8.0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:0IN;TEXT-INDENT:25.9PT'><FONT SIZE=2>I,
E. James Ferland, Chief Executive Officer of PSEG Energy Holdings L.L.C., to
the best of my knowledge, certify that (i) the Quarterly Report of PSEG Energy
Holdings LLC on Form 10-Q for the quarter ended September 30, 2003 (the
&#147;Periodic Report&#148;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or
15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and (ii) the information contained
in the Periodic Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial
condition and results of operations of the PSEG Energy Holdings L.L.C.</FONT></P>

Thomas M. O&#146;Flynn, Chief Financial Officer of PSEG Energy Holdings L.L.C., to
the best of my knowledge, certify that (i) the Quarterly Report of PSEG Energy
Holdings L.L.C. on Form 10-Q for the quarter ended September 30, 2003 (the
&#147;Periodic Report&#148;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or
15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and (ii) the information contained
in the Periodic Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial
condition and results of operations of PSEG Energy Holdings L.L.C.</FONT></P>
